Nightlight:

Nightlight was woke up, altought she was stunned and she started to 
stammered as if she tried to use a language that she had forgotten 
but she couldn't remember it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "Yes it seems that she is okay, although some of the ID data may 
have 
> been lost. Don't worry everything will be just fine, I think" Kenzo 
> said to Blackfang while waiting for the new maximal to wake up.
> 
> 
>

femme

the

was

> > > > >
